sourcesContent:
Beşinci Sayfa





Buton Tıklama İstatistikleri:

  • {{ click.button_name }}: {{ click.click_count }} kez
// src/app/components/page5/page5.component.ts import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from '../../services/user.service'; import { AuthService } from '../../services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-page5', templateUrl: './page5.component.html', styleUrls: ['./page5.component.css'] }) export class Page5Component { userId: string = ''; buttonClicks: any[] = []; constructor( private userService: UserService, private authService: AuthService, private router: Router ) {} // Buton tıklama istatistiklerini getiren fonksiyon fetchButtonClicks() { this.userService.getUserActions(this.userId).subscribe( (actions: any[]) => { this.buttonClicks = actions; }, err => { console.error(err); } ); } // Buton tıklama işlemi için yönlendirme handleButtonClick(buttonName: string) { // İsteğe bağlı olarak buton tıklama verilerini sunucuya kaydedebiliriz console.log(`${buttonName} clicked`); switch (buttonName) { case 'Page1_Button': this.router.navigate(['/page1']); break; case 'Page2_Button': this.router.navigate(['/page2']); break; case 'Page3_Button': this.router.navigate(['/page3']); break; case 'Page4_Button': this.router.navigate(['/page4']); break; case 'Page5_Button': this.router.navigate(['/page5']); break; default: console.error('Unknown button action'); } } // Çıkış işlemi logout() { this.authService.logout(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
